module.name: CallerID Lookup
module.description: Allows CallerID Lookup of incoming calls against different sources (OpenCNAM, MySQL, HTTP, ENUM, Phonebook Module)
module.changelog: *2.11.1.11* #8075 - Change number of OpenCNAM lookups on the free plan *2.11.1.10* FREEPBX-7453 HTTPS lookup type does not display a form for settings *2.11.1.9* Update license *2.11.1.8* Use FreePBX Empty Function *2.11.1.7* HTTPS Support #6477 *2.11.1.6* #6382 *2.11.1.5* Add charset to MySQL lookups *2.11.1.4* Hide none from showing up. *2.11.1.3* Fixes #6410 - remove duplicate opencnam sources and prevent that from happening in the future. *2.11.1.2* Fixes #6390 - add id to input element to fix js validation on http_host *2.11.1.1* Fixes #6374 Reorder placement of CID lookups to after blacklist. This will prevent useless dips. *2.11.1.0* Restructure module to MVC standards. Use jQuery. Setup simple module structure (future). Clean up all the junk *2.11.0.0* new version change, #6094 (Added OpenCNAM) *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes
